title: [Question]Sem 1 time table doudt
content: Does this mean every thursday in sem 1 is an holiday ???

comments.body: Then what does no schedule mean
Where have got this ?and can u send the complete one.
No. Just wait a little while they’re uploading your timetable completely, it is incomplete as of now in your pic…
i heard somewhere that sat was holiday and even mon to fri there were 3 days half day and 2 days full did they change for our batch or did i heard a rumor

That's for 2nd years. 1st years have 2 half days, 1 day till 4 pm and 2 days till 3:15. U will have online classes for the 2 credit courses on Saturday for which as long as u log in u will get attendance don't need to worry much abt it
